user.title: Add Tibber Graph entry
user.description: Configure the Tibber Graph integration to display electricity prices as camera entities. You can either provide a price entity or use the Tibber integration.

data.price_entity_id: Price entity (leave blank to use Tibber integration)

data_description.price_entity_id: Optional: Select a sensor entity containing price data (see [README.md](https://github.com/stefanes/tibber-graph?tab=readme-ov-file#custom-data-source) for details). If left blank, the Tibber integration will be used. This choice cannot be changed after creation.
data_description.entity_name: Custom name for this Tibber Graph entity (will be prefixed with 'Tibber Graph'). Leave blank to auto-generate from the price entity's friendly name (if using entity) or your Tibber home name. Must be unique across all Tibber Graph entities.
data_description.theme:
Visual theme for the graph. Choose 'Dark' for standard dark theme or 'Light' for light theme.
Default: Dark
data_description.start_graph_at:
Choose where to start the graph: 'Midnight' starts at midnight, 'Current hour' starts at current hour, 'Show all' shows all available data from first to last price point.
Default: Midnight

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure {entity_name}
reconfigure.description: Select which values to reset to their defaults. Other settings will be preserved.

data_description.reset_hours_to_show: Check to reset to show all available data from the start point (default behavior).
data_description.reset_y_tick_count: Check to reset the Y-axis tick count to automatic calculation.
data_description.reset_price_decimals: Check to reset price decimal places to automatic (2 for standard, 0 for cents).
data_description.reset_currency_override: Check to reset currency to automatic (Tibber home currency in standard mode, '¢' in cents mode).
data_description.reset_all: Check to reset ALL settings to their default values.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
abort.tibber_not_setup: The Tibber integration must be set up first.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Selected values have been reset to their defaults.

error.entity_name_exists: An entity with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
error.entity_not_found: The specified entity was not found.
error.not_sensor_entity: The entity must be a sensor.
error.no_price_source: Either a price entity must be provided or the Tibber integration must be configured.

set_option.name: Set option
set_option.description: Update one or more configuration options for a Tibber Graph entity. The entity will be reloaded automatically.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to update.

options.name: Options
options.description: Dictionary of options to update, where keys are option names (as defined in OPTIONS.md) and values are the new values. All values will be validated before applying.

reset_option.name: Reset option
reset_option.description: Reset one or more configuration options to their default values for a Tibber Graph entity. The entity will be reloaded automatically.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to reset options for.

options.name: Options
options.description: List of option names to reset (as defined in OPTIONS.md). Leave empty or omit to reset all options to their default values.

set_data_source.name: Set data source
set_data_source.description: Change the price data source for a Tibber Graph entity. Can switch between Tibber integration and a custom price entity. The entity will be reloaded automatically.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to update the data source for.

price_entity_id.name: Price entity
price_entity_id.description: The entity ID of a sensor containing price data (see README.md for details). Leave empty to use the Tibber integration instead.

render.name: Render
render.description: Render the graph for a Tibber Graph entity.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID (or list of entity IDs) of the Tibber Graph camera to render. If not provided, all Tibber Graph entities are rendered.

init.title: Options for {entity_name}
init.description: Configure how the price graph is displayed.

data.hours_to_show: Hours to show (leave empty for all available data)

data_description.theme:
Visual theme for the graph. Choose 'Dark' for standard dark theme or 'Light' for light theme.
Default: Dark
data_description.transparent_background:
Use transparent background with the selected theme, useful for OLED displays or custom dashboards.
Default: off
data_description.canvas_width:
Width of the generated graph image in pixels.
Default: 1180
data_description.canvas_height:
Height of the generated graph image in pixels.
Default: 820
data_description.force_fixed_size:
Always render at fixed size (ignores camera size requests).
Default: on
data_description.show_x_ticks:
Show tick marks on the X-axis at label positions.
Default: off
data_description.start_graph_at:
Choose where to start the graph: 'Midnight' starts at midnight, 'Current hour' starts at current hour (an extra hour before is shown for visual continuity but not included in calculations), 'Show all' shows all available data from first to last price point. The hours shown also depend on 'Hours to show' setting. All price calculations (min, max, average) are based on the displayed price data.
Default: Midnight
data_description.x_tick_step_hours:
Hours between each time label on the X-axis.
Default: 3
data_description.hours_to_show:
Number of hours to show from the start point. Leave empty to show all available data (default). To show a 24-hour period from midnight, enable 'Start at midnight' and set this to 24.
Default: all available data (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.show_y_axis:
Show the Y-axis with ticks, labels, and spine.
Default: on
data_description.show_y_axis_ticks:
Show tick marks on the Y-axis at price levels.
Default: off
data_description.show_horizontal_grid:
Show horizontal gridlines across the graph.
Default: off
data_description.show_average_price_line:
Show a dotted line at the average price level. The average is calculated from the displayed price data, taking into account filtering options like 'Start graph at' and 'Hours to show'.
Default: on
data_description.cheap_price_points:
Number of lowest-price periods to highlight with a light green background per day (0 = none). Highlights the cheapest hours or quarters for each day across all available data. Past periods are dimmed. Works in combination with 'Cheap price threshold' - always highlights at least N cheapest periods, plus any additional periods below the threshold.
Default: 0
data_description.cheap_price_threshold:
Price threshold below which periods are highlighted as cheap (0 = disabled, e.g., 0.5 = 50 öre). Works in combination with 'Cheap price points' - highlights the N cheapest periods plus any additional periods below this threshold. In the same unit as prices.
Default: 0
data_description.show_vertical_grid:
Show vertical gridlines across the graph.
Default: on
data_description.y_axis_label_rotation_deg:
Rotation angle for Y-axis labels in degrees (0 = horizontal, 90 = vertical for left side, 270 = vertical for right side).
Default: 0
data_description.y_axis_side:
Display Y-axis on the left or right side of the graph.
Default: left
data_description.y_tick_count:
Number of price ticks to show on Y-axis (leave empty for automatic).
Default: automatic (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.y_tick_use_colors:
Color Y-axis tick labels based on price levels (min/avg/max).
Default: off
data_description.use_hourly_prices:
Aggregate 15-minute intervals into hourly averages.
Default: off
data_description.use_cents:
Display prices in cents instead of main currency unit (use 'Currency override' to override).
Default: off
data_description.currency_override:
Override currency display (e.g., 'EUR', 'SEK', 'öre'). Leave blank for auto (Tibber home currency in standard mode, '¢' in cents mode).
Default: automatic (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.label_current:
Show a label for the current price on the graph.
Default: on
data_description.label_current_in_header:
Show current price label centered in header instead of on the graph.
Default: on
data_description.label_current_in_header_more:
Show additional info in header (average price and percentage to average) when 'Show current price in header' is enabled. Requires 'Show current price in header' to be enabled. The average and percentage are calculated from the displayed price data.
Default: on
data_description.label_font_size:
Font size for all labels (X-axis time, Y-axis price, and in-graph price labels).
Default: 11
data_description.label_max:
Show a label for the maximum price on the graph. The maximum is determined from the displayed price data.
Default: on
data_description.label_min:
Show a label for the minimum price on the graph. The minimum is determined from the displayed price data.
Default: on
data_description.label_minmax_show_price:
Show price value on min/max labels (if false, only time is shown).
Default: on
data_description.label_show_currency:
Show currency symbol on price labels.
Default: on
data_description.label_use_colors:
Color min/max labels green/red for easier identification.
Default: off
data_description.price_decimals:
Number of decimal places to show for prices. Leave empty for auto (2 for standard, 0 for cents).
Default: automatic (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.color_price_line_by_average:
Dynamically color the price line based on average price with smooth gradients: blue below average, amber near average, red above average. Only future prices are colored. The average is calculated from the displayed price data.
Default: on
data_description.auto_refresh_enabled:
Automatically refresh the graph at regular intervals.
Default: off
